3.caption_en:
Slide 01, "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking," poses three guiding questions about why ecosystem thinking matters, which trends are driving ecosystem-based business models, and the three levels of ecosystem thinking needed to unlock long-term business growth.

{
  "type": "slide",
  "number": "01",
  "title": "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking",
  "questions": [
    "Why is ecosystem thinking important today?",
    "What are the major trends we see leading to the dominance of ecosystem based business models?",
    "What are the 3 levels of ecosystem thinking you need to understand and apply to unlock new growth for your business in the longterm"
  ],
  "full_text": "Introduction to Ecosystem Thinking\nWhy is ecosystem thinking important today?\nWhat are the major trends we see leading to the dominance of ecosystem based business models?\nWhat are the 3 levels of ecosystem thinking you need to understand and apply to unlock new growth for your business in the longterm",
  "visual": {
    "background_color": "teal",
    "text_color": "white",
    "number_position": "top-left",
    "layout": "large heading with multiple question paragraphs"
  },
  "language": "en"
}
